properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 c2 c1 v2 c3 c4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
For all that You've done
I will thank You
For all that You're going to do
For all that You've promised
And all that You are
Is all that has carried me through
Jesus I thank You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I thank You, thank You, Lord
(sisters echo)
Thank You, thank You, Lord
(sisters echo)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Thank You for loving
And setting me free
Thank You for giving
Your life just for me
How I thank You, Lord
Jesus I thank You, Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For all that You've done
I will thank You
For all that You're going to do
For all that You've promised
And all that You are
Is all that has carried me through
Jesus I thank You

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
And we thank You, thank You Lord
(sisters echo)
And we thank You, thank You, Lord
(sisters echo)

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
Thank You for loving
And setting me free
Thank You for giving
Your life just for me
How we thank You, Lord
Jesus we thank You, Lord
